```
Usage:
  routescout [command]

Available Commands:
  completion  Generate the autocompletion script for the specified shell
  help        Help about any command
  trace       Trace & Find infomation about an IP address
  version     Shows version

Flags:
  -h, --help   help for routescout
```

## Installation

1. Make sure you have [Go][downloadgo] installed.
2. `go mod download`
3. `go install`
4. Now command has been installed `routescout` and can be used from the terminal.

<!-- LINKS -->

[downloadgo]: https://go.dev/dl
